questions.questionText: Which female driver is competing in this year's NASCAR Xfinity Series race?
questions.explanation: At 22 years old, Hailie Deegan made history as the first female driver to win a race in the NASCAR K&N Pro Series West. Deegan will be driving the No.15 Ford Mustang in this year race.

questions.questionText: In what year was NASCAR founded?
questions.explanation: The first ever race event for NASCAR was held on February 15, 1948, at the beach-road course in Daytona.

questions.questionText: What is NASCAR’s top racing series called?
questions.explanation: NASCAR Cup Series is known as the most elite of all of their series and is what helped6 put them on the map.

questions.questionText: Which NASCAR driver is known as the “The Intimidator”?
questions.explanation: Famously known for his skills behind the wheel and aggressive driving style, Earnhardt earned the nickname when he was pushed towards the infield; despite driving on the grass, he still came out in the lead.

questions.questionText: Which car manufacturer is NOT involved with NASCAR?
questions.explanation: The current cars used in the Xfinity race are Chevrolet Camaro, Ford Mustang, and Toyota Supra.
